content.rendered:
I obtained my dental degree from The University of Louisville School of Dentistry after earning my undergraduate degree from Western Kentucky University. My wife, Amber, and I recently celebrated the birth of our son, John Luke. In addition to being an active member of my church, I enjoy playing golf, working on my family farm, and spending time with family and friends.

I am passionate about providing the highest quality dental care available and am completely focused on the well-being of my patients. You can be sure that you will always be treated like family at Western Kentucky Dental.
